description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5ddbn","text":"This protocol details the generation of stable ATG3-mCherry wild-type or mutant HeLa cells with HaloTag-LC3B using lentivirus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: generation of stable ATG3-mCherry wild-type, HaloTag-LC3B,lentivirus

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Cloning pCDH1-CMV-ATG3-mCherry-Hygro lentiviral vector (ATG3 wild-type or mutants)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1hbp2","text":"Amplify the coding sequence for human ATG3 (1-125), mCherry or ATG3 (126-314) fragment using Q5 High Fidelity DNA Polymerase and purify PCR products using Gel extraction kit (Bio Basic).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Cloning pCDH1-CMV-ATG3-mCherry-Hygro lentiviral vector (ATG3 wild-type or mutants)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3g75j","text":"PCR products in step 1 are used as templates to run the second step PCR to amplify ATG3 (1- 125)-mCherry-ATG3(126-314) and gel extracted. Primers include a NheI restriction site at the 5’ end and a BamHI site at the 3’ end.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Cloning pCDH1-CMV-ATG3-mCherry-Hygro lentiviral vector (ATG3 wild-type or mutants)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6eg3m","text":"Digest the ATG3-mCherry PCR product and pCDH1-CMV-HT-LC3-SV40-Hygro plasmid using NheI and BamHI restriction enzymes (New England BioLabs).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Cloning pCDH1-CMV-ATG3-mCherry-Hygro lentiviral vector (ATG3 wild-type or mutants)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c39ul","text":"Purify the digested DNAs using Gel extraction kit (Bio Basic).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Cloning pCDH1-CMV-ATG3-mCherry-Hygro lentiviral vector (ATG3 wild-type or mutants)
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1fifj","text":"Ligate the digested ATG3-mCherry and linearized pCDH1-CMV-hygro backbone using T4 DNA ligase (New England BioLabs) according to manufacturer instructions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: HEK293T lentiviral transfection
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7905d","text":"Each plasmid for lentiviral transfection is transformed into Stbl3 competent cells for the propagation. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5inba","text":"At 72 hours post-transfection, collect retroviral supernatant into a falcon tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: HEK293T lentiviral transfection
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dv9tk","text":"Concentrate retroviral supernatant to   using Lenti-X concentrator (Takara) with the manufacturer instruction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"mpib","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"11DEDEA0090111EE8E236DFD7E5F2632","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pCDH-CMV-ATG3-mCherry lentivirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fjrh2","text":"Plate 1 x 105 ATG3 KO/HaloTag-LC3B HeLa cells into 12-well plate one day before.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":12,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pCDH-CMV-ATG3-mCherry lentivirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9mojo","text":"Next day, titrate  ,  ,   of concentrated retroviral solution with   Polybrene (Sigma) into target HeLa cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":21,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":67,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"2DB94D40090111EE8E236DFD7E5F2632","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"3307A3A0090111EE8E236DFD7E5F2632","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"2A101B60090111EE8E236DFD7E5F2632","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"1F1C9C10090111EE8E236DFD7E5F2632","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1956}}}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pCDH-CMV-ATG3-mCherry lentivirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f5cst","text":"At 24 hours post-transduction, remove retroviral supernatant and replace with fresh DMEM complete medium with   hygromycin B (Gibco).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6f9f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"3C86F980090111EE8E236DFD7E5F2632","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1798}}}}

steps.section: Transduction of HeLa cells with pCDH-CMV-ATG3-mCherry lentivirus
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8s5t6","text":"After one week of hygromycin B selection, sort HeLa cells by FACS to enrich for mCherry positive cells using Wolf G2 cell sorter (Nanocellect).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
